com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp.Controllers

Class ClaimController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp.Controllers.ClaimController

  • public class ClaimController
extends java.lang.Object
    Claim controller is responsible for communicating from any associated views to the model as well as attaching listeners to the model
    Author:
    Kyle Carlstrom, Raman Dhatt
